00236     GP_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)

00239     GP_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)
00240 
00245 #define GP_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00246 { \
00247    .id = GREEN_POWER_CLUSTER_ID, \
00248    .options = { \
00249                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00250                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00251               }, \
00252    .attributesAmount = ZCL_GP_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00253    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00254    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GP_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00255    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00256 }
00257 
00258 #define DEFINE_GP_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00259     GP_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00260

00264    .options = { \
00265                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00266                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00267               }, \

00270    .commandsAmount = ZCL_GP_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00271    .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00272 }

00302 BEGIN_PACK
00303 /***************************************************************************/
00307 typedef struct PACK
00308 {
00309   struct PACK
00310   {
00311     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00312     uint8_t             type;         
00313     uint8_t             properties;   
00314     uint8_t             value;        
00315   } gppMaxProxyTableEntries;
00316   struct PACK
00317   {
00318     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00319     uint8_t             type;         
00320     uint8_t             properties;   
00321     uint8_t             value[2];     
00322   } proxyTable;
00323   struct PACK
00324   {
00325     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00326     uint8_t             type;         
00327     uint8_t             properties;   
00328     uint8_t             value[3];     
00329   } gppFunctionality;
00330   struct PACK
00331   {
00332     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00333     uint8_t             type;         
00334     uint8_t             properties;   
00335     uint8_t             value[3];     
00336   } gppActiveFunctionality;
00337   struct PACK
00338   {
00339     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00340     uint8_t             type;         
00341     uint8_t             properties;   
00342     uint8_t             value;        
00343   } gpSharedSecurityKeyType;
00344   struct PACK
00345   {
00346     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00347     uint8_t             type;         
00348     uint8_t             properties;   
00349     uint8_t             value[16];        
00350   } gpSharedSecuritykey;
00351   struct PACK
00352   {
00353     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00354     uint8_t             type;         
00355     uint8_t             properties;   
00356     uint8_t            value[16];        
00357   } gpLinkKey;
00358   struct PACK
00359   {
00360     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00361     uint8_t             type;         
00362     uint8_t             properties;   
00363     uint16_t            value;        
00364   } clusterRevision;
00365 
00366 } ZCL_GreenPowerClusterClientAttributes_t;
00367 
00368 /***************************************************************************/
00372 typedef struct PACK
00373 {
00374   struct PACK
00375   {
00376     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00377     uint8_t             type;         
00378     uint8_t             properties;   
00379     uint8_t             value;        
00380   } gpsMaxSinkTableEntries;
00381   struct PACK
00382   {
00383     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00384     uint8_t             type;         
00385     uint8_t             properties;   
00386     uint8_t             value[2];     
00387   } sinkTable;
00388   struct PACK
00389   {
00390     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00391     uint8_t             type;         
00392     uint8_t             properties;   
00393     uint8_t             value;        
00394   } gpsCommunicationMode;
00395   struct PACK
00396   {
00397     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00398     uint8_t             type;         
00399     uint8_t             properties;   
00400     uint8_t             value;        
00401   } gpsCommissioningExitMode;
00402   struct PACK
00403   {
00404     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00405     uint8_t             type;         
00406     uint8_t             properties;   
00407     uint16_t             value;        
00408   } gpsCommissioningWindow;
00409   struct PACK
00410   {
00411     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00412     uint8_t             type;         
00413     uint8_t             properties;   
00414     uint8_t             value;        
00415   } gpsSecurityLevel;
00416   struct PACK
00417   {
00418     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00419     uint8_t             type;         
00420     uint8_t             properties;   
00421     uint8_t            value[3];        
00422   } gpsFunctionality;
00423   struct PACK
00424   {
00425     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00426     uint8_t             type;         
00427     uint8_t             properties;   
00428     uint8_t            value[3];        
00429   } gpsActiveFunctionality;
00430   struct PACK
00431   {

00435     uint8_t             value;        
00436   } gpSharedSecurityKeyType;

00459 } ZCL_GreenPowerClusterServerAttributes_t;
00460 END_PACK
